mapper.select: select TASK_ID, JVM_ID, APP_NAME, TASK_NAME, METHOD_NAME, TRIGGER_TYPE, TRIGGER_PARA, METHOD_ARGUMENTS, OPREATION_TIME, MSG_TYPE, GROUP_FLAG, STATUS, GROUPNO, GROUPNUM, CREATETIME, UPDATETIME, NOTE from JMF_TASK_LIST where JVM_ID = #{jvmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: update JMF_TASK_LIST set JVM_ID = #{jvmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APP_NAME = #{appName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TASK_NAME = #{taskName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, METHOD_NAME = #{methodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRIGGER_TYPE = #{triggerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRIGGER_PARA = #{triggerPara,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, METHOD_ARGUMENTS = #{methodArguments,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPREATION_TIME = #{opreationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MSG_TYPE = #{msgType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GROUP_FLAG = #{groupFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GROUPNO = #{groupno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GROUPNUM = #{groupnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATETIME = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, NOTE = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where TASK_ID = #{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select TASK_ID, JVM_ID, APP_NAME, TASK_NAME, METHOD_NAME, TRIGGER_TYPE, TRIGGER_PARA, METHOD_ARGUMENTS, OPREATION_TIME, MSG_TYPE, GROUP_FLAG, STATUS, GROUPNO, GROUPNUM, CREATETIME, UPDATETIME, NOTE from JMF_TASK_LIST where TASK_ID = #{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select TASK_ID, JVM_ID, APP_NAME, TASK_NAME, METHOD_NAME, TRIGGER_TYPE, TRIGGER_PARA, METHOD_ARGUMENTS, OPREATION_TIME, MSG_TYPE, GROUP_FLAG, STATUS, GROUPNO, GROUPNUM, CREATETIME, UPDATETIME, NOTE from JMF_TASK_LIST
